items.title: Teslas are getting torched in Berlin as surveys show Germans are deserting Elon Musk’s carmaker in droves
items.description: Surveys conducted by Caliber and T-Online both show a sharp drop in favorability for Tesla among Germans.

items.title: Gwyneth Paltrow is ready to take 17-year-old Goop into its next era
The stock market gained 2% during Biden’s first 60 days. Under Trump the market has tanked 7%
items.description: The S&P 500, Nasdaq, Dow Jones have all plummeted since President Donald Trump took office in January.

items.title: Robinhood launches prediction market with March Madness, Fed rates as first offerings
items.description: The move underscores Robinhood's push into the fast-growing field of prediction markets.

items.title: Gwyneth Paltrow is taking Goop back to basics—and says her best source of business advice is her ‘Fight Club’ group chat of female CEOs
